mods.abstract: Formal head and shoulders portrait of Fannie Anfenger (1885-1965) as a young woman wearing a lace dress and elaborate necklace. Fannie Anfenger was the daughter of Louis and Louise Schlesinger Anfenger. She married Sidney Rinds and they had one son, Louis Rinds.
mods.note: Title supplied by archivist. ||Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 20.
On back of photograph: ''#362 Fannie Anfenger about 1905 daughter of Louis Anfenger Donor Marjorie Hornbein acquired 11/80''. On envelope: ''#362 Fannie Anfenger, c 1905''.
Good 5 x 4 inches black and white
